rule-5-19-a.test_description: Building area type = "school (primary)"; building includes a conditioned zone that has two exterior walls with windows. Baseline fenestration area is  established correctly.

standard.rule_description: For building areas not shown in Table Table G3.1.1-1, vertical fenestration areas for new buildings and additions shall equal that in the proposed design or 40% of gross above-grade wall area, whichever is smaller,
